events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product has several scratches and a faulty button that does not respond when pressed.
The issue has been categorized as a product defect due to the reported scratches and faulty button.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the case regarding the defective product.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the issues with your product. I’m here to help you.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and the faulty button so we can assess the damage more accurately?
Here are the pictures showing the scratches on the side and the button that doesn’t work at all when I try pressing it.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement product or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement. Please send it as soon as possible, as I need this product urgently.
We have processed your replacement order and you will receive tracking details shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement product and that everything is working as expected.
Yes, I got the replacement today, and it is in perfect condition. Thanks for the quick response!
We are glad to hear that the replacement product meets your expectations. Closing the case now, thank you for contacting support.
